about_the_game:
Monstrous Lair #1 Owlbear Nest


A System Neutral Edition GM's Resource by Mike Welham

Monstrous Lair: Owlbear Nestprovides you--the busy, time crunched GM--with the details to effortlessly bring to life the owlbear nests in your campaign. Are you a busy GM? Does session prep take too long? Do you never have time to work on the cool little details that can bring your adventures, dungeons and campaign to life? This short, focused compilation gives you, the time-crunched GM, the tools to effortlessly add verisimilitude and detail to your dungeons. Use the material herein either before or during play and bask in your players' adulation.

This book is compatible with every edition of the world's most popular role-playing game.

For a free sample, visit Raging Swan Press's website.

Converted by: Michael Potter

Released on July 16, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.5 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.
